title: Scarab swarm

properties.name: description
properties.value: Scarab swarms are swarms of poisonous scarab beetles. Although their max hit is low, they are highly accurate with an extremely fast attack speed and are very likely to poison any players that they attack. They can crawl up from the ground randomly in some pyramid areas, and have a chance of spawning when the gold chest is opened in Pyramid Plunder.

Scarab swarms are swarms of poisonous scarab beetles. Although their max hit is low, they are highly accurate with an extremely fast attack speed and are very likely to poison any players that they attack. They can crawl up from the ground randomly in some pyramid areas, and have a chance of spawning when the gold chest is opened in Pyramid Plunder.

They are only aggressive to players that cause them to spawn. Once the targeted player leaves, the scarab swarm will ignore other players and eventually despawn.

The scarab swarms that spawn in Jaldraocht Pyramid are simply known as Scarabs. While they have a lower combat level, they have the same appearance and behaviour.

  • Sophanem Dungeon
  • Klenter's Pyramid
  • Jaldraocht Pyramid

Drops[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always690

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Strangely, even though scarabs do not drop anything, and despite these swarms consisting of a group of insects, scarab swarms drop bones on death.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 September 2015
(update)

Scarab Swarms should no longer follow you outside of Pyramid Plunder.

16 May â€“
13 June 2006

The NPC was renamed from "Scarabs" to "Scarab swarm".
